qas.question: Where is the Ivanpah Solar Power Facility located?
What is the world's largest solar-thermal power plant project currently under construction?
Where is the PS20 solar power tower located?
Where is the Ivanpah State Facility located?
What is the world's largest solar-thermal power plant project currently not under construction?
Where is the XBX20 solar power tower located?
Where is the Nevada Solar Two located?

context: Solar thermal power stations include the 354 megawatt (MW) Solar Energy Generating Systems power plant in the USA, Solnova Solar Power Station (<b5_0>Spain<b5_0/>, 150 MW), Andasol solar power station (Spain, 100 MW), Nevada Solar One (<b6_0>USA<b6_0/>, 64 MW), PS20 solar power tower (<a2_0>Spain<a2_0/>, 20 MW), and the PS10 solar power tower (Spain, 11 MW). The 370 MW <a1_0><b4_0>Ivanpah Solar Power Facility<b4_0/><a1_0/>, located in <a0_0><b3_0>California's Mojave Desert<b3_0/><a0_0/>, is the world's largest solar-thermal power plant project currently under construction. Many other plants are under construction or planned, mainly in Spain and the USA. In developing countries, three World Bank projects for integrated solar thermal/combined-cycle gas-turbine power plants in Egypt, Mexico, and Morocco have been approved.
